instructions.title: How to Delete Your Calm Subscription From Apple
instructions.before: If you have a subscription account, just deleting your account won’t cancel the subscription.  You must cancel the subscription first by following the steps below. Once this is done, you have the option of deleting the free account if you choose.
instructions.after: If you don’t see 'Calm.com' under ‘Active’ subscriptions then you do not have anything you need to Cancel.  If you see the Calm Free Trial Subscription on your list, please open it. Once open you will see the Calm subscription screen. Tap the "Cancel Subscription" button.  This will cancel your trial Subscription.

qnAnswers.question: I Just Downloaded The Calm App.  Am I going To Be Charged?
qnAnswers.answer: No.  The Calm App is free to download, and you will not incur any charges from downloading it or creating a calm account

qnAnswers.question: Will Canceling My Free Calm.com Account Cancel My Subscription?
qnAnswers.answer: No. Once you activate a free trial through iTunes, you will need to cancel before the end of the trial period to avoid being charged for the annual subscription.  Calm is not able to cancel a free trial on your behalf.   [Click here for more details] (https://support.calm.com/hc/en-us/articles/115005144313-How-to-cancel-iOS-free-trial-through-the-iTunes-App-Store)

qnAnswers.question: Will Canceling My Free Calm.com Account Cancel My Subscription?
qnAnswers.answer: If you have been charged for a subscription and no longer wish to use Calm, you can request a refund from Apple. Please note, you will need to work with Apple directly, as Calm is not able to manage in-app purchases or offer refunds on their behalf.

qnAnswers.question: Can I get A Refund If I Was Charged For My Subscription?
qnAnswers.answer: Once you activate a free trial through  Itunes or the Google Play store, you will need to cancel at least 24 hours before the trial ends to avoid being charged for the annual subscription.

steps: Open Settings on your IOS Device
Open Itunes & App Store
On the screen that appears, tap your Apple ID listed at the top
In the pop-up modal that shows, tap 'View Apple ID', and sign in if requested to do so
This brings you to an Account Settings page.  Scroll down and tap the ‘Subscriptions’ Option
Here you will see a list of your current Apple Subscriptions. If you do not see Calm listed under ‘Active’, you are using the free version of Calm and have not activated a subscription trial.

instructions.title: How To Delete Your Free Calm Account
instructions.before: There are two different types Calm.com Accounts.  There is a free account and a paid subscription account.  The steps listed below outline the only way to delete your Free Calm.com Account.
instructions.after: After you send the deletion request you will receive a confirmation email letting you know that your account has been deleted.

qnAnswers.answer: No. Once you activate a free trial through iTunes, you will need to cancel before the end of the trial period to avoid being charged for the annual subscription. steps: Go to the [Calm.com](https://www.calm.com). If you're already logged in, doing so will open your Calm.com home page
Scroll Down to the bottom of page and Click Contact Us
Click “Subscribe” to see what your current subscription status is
Click I Still Need Help
Type the Email Associated with your Calm.com Account
Under ‘Subject’ Type ‘Delete Account’
Under ‘Description’ Type ‘I would like to Delete my Free Calm.com Account’
Select your Device
Under ‘What can we help you with?’ Click ‘Other’
Click ‘Submit Now’
You will receive a confirmation message that your request has been sent
